entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
